title: Krushimandi Admin Panel
description: Full-stack agricultural marketplace management system built for Krushimandi Innovations Pvt Ltd during internship. Features include user management, fruit listings, order monitoring, notifications, and super admin control with real-time Firebase synchronization.

title: MediSense AI - Intelligent Healthcare Platform
description: AI-powered healthcare web application providing symptom analysis, medicine identification, health chatbot, and medical facility discovery. Features custom ML model with 99% accuracy, OCR scanning, and 100% free architecture without API limitations.
videoPath: /data/DigiMeds/MediSense AI - Your Intelligent Health Assistant - Brave 2025-11-05 18-54-10.mp4

title: Library Management System
description: Comprehensive MERN stack application for library operations with complete CRUD functionality, advanced search, book borrowing management, and cloud MongoDB Atlas integration. Features modern UI with responsive design and real-time data synchronization.

title: Video Summarizer and Quiz Generator
description: AI-powered educational platform transforming YouTube lectures into concise summaries, interactive quizzes, and personalized Q&A sessions. Built with Gradio and Google Gemini AI to help students learn smarter and educators assess better.
